thread.title: Jim Jones Signs With Roc Nation
thread.title_full: Jim Jones Signs With Roc Nation

author: Kevin Goddard
title: Jim Jones Signs With Roc Nation

organizations.name: roc nation jim jones signs with roc nation

text:
Home > Music > Jim Jones Signs With Roc Nation Jim Jones Signs With Roc Nation 3 0 Posted by Kevin Goddard , Feb 7, 2017 at 11:49pm Jim Jones is the newest addition to Roc Nation. 
Following recent signees such as Yo Gotti , The Lox , & Fat Joe , it appears Jim Jones can now also call Roc Nation his home. On Tuesday night, the former Dipset rapper took to IG to hint at his new deal, which was later confirmed by Roc Nation’s own Vic Medina shortly after. 
It’s unknown if Jones signed a management deal or a distribution one, but either way it’s a great look for the 40-year old Bronx rapper. His latest album, The Kitchen , was released on his own independent label back in June, so either deal could be a possibility. 
Check out the cryptic announcement via the IG posts (below). We’ll keep you posted if anything more surfaces. A photo posted by jimjonescapo (@jimjonescapo) on Feb 7, 2017 at 6:20pm PST A photo posted by jimjonescapo (@jimjonescapo) on Feb 7, 2017 at 2:09pm PST A photo posted by #NewRules (@mrvicmedina) on Feb 7, 2017 at 2:11pm PST < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 7, 2017 at 11:49pm 302 Views 
Waka sets the record straight with his beef with Gucci Mane, and also talks about his upcoming single "Was My Dawg." Jim Jones is the newest addition to Roc Nation.
